title: SKIN SALE
body: Does anyone know when the underworld skins will be on sale again???

replies.body: Riot has said that events like Harrowing won't line up with real world times anymore, dk why. So while you are correct in saying "Usually on halloween", this year at least will be UNUSUAL.

I think they were referring to the game mode events, Skins etc should still be lining up with the original date (otherwise there wouldn't be an opportunity to sell the skins)

After all they released the April fools skins on the right date, but the event (URF) wasn't released.
Ahh ok well I said that Underworld TF would be back on Halloween, some guy started roasting me about this.
